snippet.title: Renaissance Kingdom Wars - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2533020/Renaissance_Kingdom_Wars/

Renaissance Kingdom Wars is set to launch this February 2024! Redesigned from the ground up, it's our biggest and most ambitious title yet and we can`t wait to share the game with you.

Embark on your journey as a landless mercenary captain, scheming and fighting your way to the crown in this modern retro take on the early 2000s golden age of RTS and Grand Strategy.

The year is 1510. In this grand strategy & RTS hybrid you play as one of 100 characters across medieval Europe, Africa and Middle East. Immersed in the 16th and 17th centuries, RKW revolves around early gunpowder warfare and scalable gameplay.
